        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14801</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Demokratische Regierung</string>
            <string language="en">Democratic government</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gouvernement démocratique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Governo democrático</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Governo democratico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημοκρατική κυβέρνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gobierno democrático</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Webquiz mit 5 unterschiedlichen Übungen über Demokratie und mit nützlichen Links zu Informationen über Demokratie.</string>
            <string language="en">Webquiz with 5 different exercises about democracy and with useful links about democracy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquiz avec 5 exercices différents au sujet de 
démocratie et avec des liens utiles au sujet de démocratie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Webquiz com 5 exercícios diferentes sobre a 
democracia e com ligações úteis sobre a democracia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Webquiz con 5 esercitazioni differenti circa la 
democrazia e con i collegamenti utili circa la democrazia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webquiz με 5 διαφορετικές ασκήσεις για τη 
δημοκρατία και με τις χρήσιμες συνδέσεις για τη δημοκρατία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Webquiz con 5 diversos ejercicios sobre democracia
y con conexiones útiles con democracia.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>

          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">10-19</string>
            <string language="en">10-19</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Webquiz für Geschichte und Politische Bildung über Demokratie und demokratische Regierung. Übungen (Kreuzworträtsel, Lückentexte und Zuordnungsübungen) sollen überprüfen, wie gut Studierende Informationen aus dem Internet nutzen können.</string>
            <string language="en">Webquiz for civics. Students will consolidate/revise their knowledges about democracy and democratic government. Exercises (crossworrds, gap-fill and matching exercises) are aimed for checking how well the students  can use their knowledges and information from internet.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
